text: The Whole of the Moon is a 1997 New Zealand Canadian drama movie directed by Ian Mune and was based on the novel of the same name by Duncan Fletcher. It stars Toby Fisher, Nikki Si'ulepa, Paul Gittins, and Pascale Bussi√®res. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 drama movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Cancer in movies Category:Movies directed by Ian Mune
title: The Whole of the Moon (movie)
